meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of leaves.
meanings.sent1: The tree had leavy branches swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The forest was leavy and green, providing shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The leavy salad looked like a miniature forest on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her leavy hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The leavy canopy above created a peaceful, natural atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: After the party, guests began to leavy one by one.
meanings.sent2: The train will leavy the station in five minutes.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit leavy the hat in a surprising trick.
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, the shadows leavy the garden, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The students will leavy the classroom when the bell rings.

meanings.definition: To impose a tax or fee.
meanings.sent1: The government decided to leavy a new tax on luxury items.
meanings.sent2: The city council voted to leavy a fee for parking in the downtown area.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant tried to leavy an extra charge for sharing a dessert.
meanings.sent4: The landlord had to leavy a fine for late rent payments.
meanings.sent5: The company will leavy a surcharge for expedited shipping services.
